name: A Walk in the Park (emwav3)
description:
Park Ranger Pete, here!

GigantaCorp is coming to take our park! Team up with an army of squirrels, a couple of angry protesters, and some poisonous mushrooms to rid the park of corporate scum!

Credits Game Design

Ryan Eads & Lawrence Foley

Programming

Lawrence Foley

Art

Ryan Eads, John Foley, Lawrence Foley

Music & Sound

Ryan Eads, Harrison Eads, and inspectorJ("Birds")
